channel.title: Hazard Course?
channel.description:
I realize that I may be the only one clamoring for this, but does the BM dev team plan on including a recreation of the Hazard Course in the Xen pack? It was one of my favorite things in the original half life.
also, obligatory DUCK JUMP DUCK JUMP DUCK JUMP DUCK JUMP
how do I fix the jump height in skill.cfg? I'm not even sure what that question means.

item.title: Hazard Course?
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
Hi,

More information about crouch jumping and jump height here:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13835

Also, the developers have stated many times that they will not work on Hazard Course, Uplink, Blue Shift, Opposing Force and Decay.

Read full topic

item.title: Hazard Course?
item.dc:creator: fulis
item.description:
No, they’re not going to make it.

Read full topic
